amendment.description: To require a study regarding promotion eligibility of retired warrant officers on active duty.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3277 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3277 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Miller. (consideration: CR S6433-6435; text: CR S6435) To require a study regarding promotion eligibility of retired warrant officers on active duty.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3277 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Miller.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3277 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
